Mr. KILEY of California. Mr. Speaker, this is the first opportunity I  have had to address the House since the passage of Prop 50 in  California to re-gerrymander our State and to return us to the era of  political gerrymandering.

Of course, I was against the proposition because I am against  gerrymandering…
